content: knit this gorgeous slouchy cardigan using bulky yarn and the relaxing garter stitch the downtown cardigan is a chunky cardigan that looks so chic with its baggy sleeves bold ribbing and well-defined stitches this statement cardigan works up very quickly and is perfect for beginners keep in mind that this cardigan is very oversized with 14-20 of positive ease built into the design when choosing your size if you do not want your cardigan to be as oversized you can go down a size note that if you do not want the sleeves to be as baggy you can follow the smaller size or do fewer increase row there are three increase row in the sleeve the sleeve pattern has been adjusted for the sizes m/l xl/2x 3x/4x so they are not as oversized and voluminous as when this pattern was first published in nov 2018 a size chart has also been added to the blog post and pdf if you like this cardigan check out the ** midtown cardigan 1 ** and ** uptown cardigan 2 ** that also use the garter stitch both use level 3 lightweight yarn the ** dotty cardigan 3 ** and ** ridgeline cardigan 4 ** use bulky level 5 yarn if you enjoy working with chunky yarns 1 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-the-midtown-cardigan/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-the-uptown-cardigan/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/pattern -the-dotty-cardigan/ 4 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-the-ridgeline-cardigan/
